snippet: A full inquiry into a deal to build Britain’s first nuclear power station since 1995 threatens delays that could undermine investment plans for the project.
abstract: European regulators in Brussels say they expect to conduct full inquiry into deal to build Britain’s first nuclear power station since 1995, threatening delays that could undermine investment plans for the project.

byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and STANLEY REED

lead_paragraph: A full inquiry into a deal to build Britain’s first nuclear power station since 1995 threatens delays that could undermine investment plans for the project.

headline.main: Brussels to Investigate Deal for British Nuclear Plant
headline.print_headline: Brussels to Investigate Deal for Nuclear Plant
